Package no.ntnu.idatt2003.view

package no.ntnu.idatt2003.view
  • Class
    Description
    GenericGameView
    a shared class for the parts of the view that are used by both games
    LaddergameView
    This class is responsible for displaying the game board and the players in the Laddergame.
    MenuView
    This class is responsible for creating the main menu of the application.
    MonopolyView
    This class is the view for the Monopoly game.
    PopupView
    This class is responsible for creating popups in the application.
    PositionChangeObserver
    This interface defines a method to observe changes in a player's position.
    TradeView
    This class represents the trade view in the Monopoly game.
    ViewMain
    This is the launch method for the program and the main GUI class.
